replies.body:
{{champion:58}} NASUS!!!!!!

{{champion:75}} *sigh* Here we go again....

{{champion:58}} I am here to *hiccup* give you a piece of my mind.

{{champion:75}} Renekton? Are you drunk? 

{{champion:58}} *hiccup* Maybe?

{{champion:75}} How!? We are Ascendent beings. We can't get drunk from alcohol. 

{{champion:58}}  Maybe I'm drunk on my hate for you brother. *hiccup*

{{champion:75}} What have you been drinking?

{{champion:58}} My new favorite water hole. It taste great. 

 {{champion:75}} I think I need to see this water. 

{{champion:58}} Ok. But before that I have to tell you something. 

{{champion:75}} What is it? 

{{champion:58}} I love you so much. *hiccup* and that is why I hate you so much. 

{{champion:75}} Look I am sorry that you were trap for 1000 years, but you told me to seal you both in there. 

{{champion:58}} Oh I know. I am not mad at you for that. 

{{champion:75}} What? Then why do you want to kill me?

{{champion:58}} 1000 years...for 1000 years I was in there..and YOU NEVER VISITED ME!!!! 

{{champion:75}} What!?

{{champion:58}} You could of come to the door at any time and talk to me through the door. You could of been like "Hi Renekton. Everything ok in there? Want to talk for a bit?" 

{{champion:75}} Umm...

{{champion:58}} You didn't even visited for Harrowing, Snowdown, or even my birthdays...that hurt the most *hiccup*

{{champion:75}} I...I had no idea...

{{champion:58}} And that is not even the worst part..the worst part was....*falls to the ground* ZZZZZZzzzzzzzzzz

{{champion:75}} .....

{{champion:58}} ZZZZZZzzzzzzZZZZZZZzzzz

{{champion:75}} Guess I have to wait for him to wake up now.
You changed your Summoner icon! I don't like change. Change is scary.
{{champion:121}} Change.....is good.
{{champion:38}} The balance of power must be preserved!
Why don't you just Riftcrawl away Kass.
